DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research identify prevalence preconception health ( PCH ) risk factor Wellington-Dufferin-Guelph ( WDG ) catchment area determine whether client-driven electronic preconception health risk assessment tool `` My Health eSnapshot '' , use healthcare visit , increase preconception health knowledge behaviour change among woman reproductive age ( 15-49 year ) .
DOC.brief_title: My Health eSnapshot - A Preconception Health Research Study
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose project : 1 . To develop client-driven electronic preconception health client risk assessment tool use primary care set . 2 . To develop customized key message handout patient base risk assessment result . 3 . To determine successful sustainable process healthcare provider ( HCPs ) administer risk assessment tool discus result patient within primary care set . 4 . To increase participant ' knowledge preconception health risk factor result risk assessment tool discussion HCP . 5 . To modify participant ' health behaviour result risk assessment tool discussion HCP . 6 . To increase WDG Public Health 's understanding prevalent preconception health risk factor among reproductive woman WDG .
DOC.criteria: Women reproductive age ( 1549 year ) Not pregnant hysterectomy A resident WellingtonDufferinGuelph catchment area Able read write English Have valid email address Willing create unique identifier code study protect identify Are comfortable use tablet
